heroIntro:
Imagine waking up in your own Mediterranean retreat, where sunshine, golf courses, and pristine beaches define your daily reality. This stunning 3-bedroom bungalow in VistaBella Golf offers the perfect holiday home escape you've been dreaming of. Located in San Miguel de Salinas, one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after communities, this property combines contemporary comfort with the relaxed coastal lifestyle that makes the Spanish Mediterranean so irresistible.

At €415,000, this premium-specification bungalow represents exceptional value—40% less expensive than comparable properties on Spanish islands while offering the same quality and lifestyle. With 92m² of thoughtfully designed living space and access to world-class golf facilities, this is your gateway to the ultimate sunshine retreat. Whether you're seeking a second home for extended holidays or a rental investment with proven demand (€800+ per week), this property delivers on every level.
areaSection: San Miguel de Salinas sits at the heart of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential zone, nestled between Orihuela and Torrevieja. This charming municipality offers the perfect balance of tranquility and accessibility—close enough to everything you need, far enough from tourist crowds. The area enjoys over 300 days of annual sunshine, Mediterranean breezes, and a temperate climate that makes outdoor living a year-round pleasure. VistaBella Golf, where this property is located, is recognized as one of the region's premier residential communities, designed with lifestyle and relaxation at its core. The surrounding landscape features rolling hills, lush greenery, and that distinctive Costa Blanca character that makes it endlessly appealing to discerning international buyers.
lifestyleSection: Life in San Miguel de Salinas centers around leisure, community, and the simple pleasures of Mediterranean living. The established expat community means English is widely spoken, and you'll find a welcoming international atmosphere everywhere from local cafes to golf clubs. Mornings start with fresh coffee at beachfront chiringuitos, afternoons drift between the championship golf courses nearby, and evenings are spent exploring authentic Spanish restaurants or watching sunsets over the Torrevieja salt lakes. Local markets brim with fresh produce, supermarkets cater to every dietary preference, and healthcare facilities with English-speaking doctors provide complete peace of mind. The slower pace of life here—without sacrificing modern convenience—is precisely what attracts families, retirees, and holiday home seekers to this corner of Costa Blanca.
investmentSection: Beyond its appeal as a personal holiday retreat, this bungalow presents a compelling investment opportunity in Costa Blanca's strongest market. San Miguel de Salinas has experienced consistent 8% year-on-year property appreciation, outpacing broader Spanish real estate trends. The rental market remains robust—holiday rentals average €800+ per week, suggesting annual rental income potential of €35,000-€40,000 with proper management. Compared to other premium Costa Blanca locations, this represents outstanding value: you're acquiring a modern, move-in-ready property at €4,511/m² while the municipal average sits at €2,200/m². This 50% premium is justified by VistaBella Golf's reputation, premium construction quality, and the property's immediate revenue potential. Whether held long-term for appreciation or actively rented, this investment ticks every box for savvy international buyers.
conclusion: This exceptional 3-bedroom bungalow in VistaBella Golf represents your perfect Mediterranean holiday escape—a sophisticated retreat combining investment potential with year-round sunshine, world-class golf, and pristine beaches. At €415,000, you're acquiring premium-specification property at 40% less than Spanish island alternatives, with proven €800+ weekly rental income and consistent market appreciation. Whether this becomes your cherished seasonal retreat, primary retirement home, or smart investment portfolio addition, the decision is compelling. The established international community, English-speaking convenience, and accessible luxury lifestyle make settling in effortless. Ready to transform your Mediterranean dreams into reality? The Regional Hospital in nearby Torrevieja (8km) provides emergency services and specialized departments. Private clinics throughout the area offer alternative options, and English-speaking doctors are standard at most practices. Routine medical needs are handled by local health centers, and pharmacy services are readily available. Many residents appreciate the blend of Spanish healthcare quality with English-speaking convenience, making medical care stress-free for foreign property owners.

For larger shopping expeditions, Torrevieja's shopping centers offer extensive retail, while local shops scattered throughout the community cater to everyday needs. The blend of efficiency and authentic Spanish market culture makes shopping here both practical and pleasurable.

Driving throughout the region is intuitive with well-maintained roads, and parking at your property is secure and convenient. The strategic location puts major Costa Blanca attractions within 30-60 minutes, making day trips and exploration easy.

faqs.question: Сколько стоит эта недвижимость?
faqs.answer: €415,000. This 3-bedroom bungalow in VistaBella Golf is priced at €4,511 per square meter, representing premium specification at 40% less than comparable Spanish island markets. Flexible payment options and mortgage arrangements are available for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Non-Spanish residents can purchase property in Spain without restrictions or limitations. You'll need an NIE number (foreigner identification number) and a Spanish bank account, but the process is straightforward. Professional legal guidance ensures all requirements are met smoothly.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs: transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (0.5-1%), property registration (0.1%), and legal fees (1-2%). For this €415,000 property, budget approximately €35,000-€55,000 in total additional costs. Spanish banks often cover some costs through favorable financing terms.

faqs.question: Сколько составляет налог на недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Annual property tax (IBI) averages 0.4-1.1% of cadastral value in Alicante province, typically €400-€800 yearly for properties in this category. Additionally, community fees for VistaBella Golf average €1,500-€2,000 annually. These are significantly lower than many northern European countries.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers commonly obtain Spanish mortgages. Most lenders offer 70-80% LTV financing to non-residents with stable income documentation. Interest rates are competitive, currently 3-4% for fixed terms. Your legal advisor will facilitate arrangements with English-speaking mortgage specialists.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Exceptional. Costa Blanca enjoys 300+ days of annual sunshine with average temperatures of 17°C winter and 28°C summer. Mediterranean breezes moderate heat in summer, while winters remain mild and pleasant. This climate supports year-round outdoor living and leisure activities.

faqs.question: Является ли Коста-Бланка хорошим местом для покупки недвижимости?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca is one of Spain's strongest property markets. Consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation, established infrastructure, excellent healthcare, and robust rental markets make it ideal for investment and lifestyle. The international expat community provides support networks and social opportunities.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Significantly lower than Northern Europe and the UK. Groceries, dining out, utilities, and healthcare cost 30-40% less. A comfortable lifestyle for a couple averages €1,500-€2,000 monthly (excluding property costs). Rental income often covers all living expenses completely.

faqs.question: Подходит ли Коста-Бланка для пенсионеров?
faqs.answer: Ideal. Costa Blanca attracts thousands of retirees seeking affordable living, excellent healthcare, year-round sunshine, and vibrant expat communities. Low cost of living stretches pensions further, while healthcare standards match Northern European expectations with lower out-of-pocket expenses.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, holiday rental is perfectly legal and common. Properties average €800+ weekly in this area, generating €35,000-€40,000 annually. Register your property with local authorities and understand regional rental regulations. Professional property management companies handle all details for 15-20% commission.
